page.title: 05SAWMILL
page.content: The Fermer Farm Sawmill was started five years ago and is part of the estate of Lord Hesketh.Managed by Mr. Roy Goodger the site occupies about five acres and employs a staff of nine who are all local people.The majority of business is supplying fencing materials to local farmers and also over an area of fifty miles from base. Fencing materials are pressure treated by Tandilin which will give the wood a life of thirty to forty years.Two vehicles aid the work and modern machinery is used for all sawing purposes,a new sawing machine will be installed later this year.Summertime work is conducted outside but there is covered shelter for winter work.Oak is supplied to the furniture trade.
